title: New: Olivera – Flow
content:
So she’s already proved her top line capabilities by featuring on a John Dahlback tune, but this debut solo offering from Finland’s Olivera is far more up my street than the ‘progressive house’ of Dahlback. Flow is effortlessly pop, think Passion Pit, CHVRCHES or M83, in it’s brilliant extravagance; heady synths and perfect vocals. Early days, but there’s enough to suggest that this twenty year old could have a very bright future ahead of her.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.

(Props)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
